goal.en: The purpose of the course "Stellar Formation and Evolution" is to understand the physics of formation and evolution of stars. Course web page: https://s3b.astro.ncu.edu.tw/star_202202/ In case we need to have an on-line lecture, join us by clicking following link. https://meet.google.com/bwn-knxk-qwq

content.en:
- Basic assumptions for stellar evolution study
- Equations for stellar evolution study
- Basic physics of gas and radiation in stars
- Nuclear processes in stars
